definition[0]: the action of gradually removing or reducing something, by taking a small amount away at a time
example[0]: The budget cuts have been made by a process of salami slicing.
definition[1]: the illegal act of stealing money from an organization by using a computer to remove extremely small amounts from its financial accounts over a period of time
example[1]: A number of corporations have been subjected to salami slicing fraud.
definition[2]: an act of removing or reducing something by doing it very slowly and gradually, so people do not realize what is happening
